short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and close tabs to reduce memory usage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of cluttered tabs but don't want to lose your important websites? Introducing Rested, the ultimate solution for efficient tab management on Chrome!

Features:

Rest and Revive:
Easily put your tabs to rest without closing them. Keep your browsing session clutter-free while preserving your valuable websites.

Quick Access:
Access your rested tabs effortlessly whenever you need them. No more digging through bookmarks or history â€“ your favorite sites are just a click away.

Workspace for Seamless Browsing:
A powerful feature to save and open sets of tabs effortlessly. Create customized workspaces for different projects, tasks, or interests. 

Wake and Remove:
Once you wake them up, rested tabs gracefully leave the list. Your workspace or individual tabs are ready to go without unnecessary clutter.

How to Use:

Click the Rested icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Select the tabs you want to rest.
Enjoy clutter-free browsing.
Revisit your rested tabs with a single click.

Stay organized, stay focused with Rested. Download now and experience a new level of tab management!
